TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_azaway, title = azaway, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/azaway} }

S.FORM: azaway u saatekakay ku kilang nu azaway. sipisanga' tu kawil nu tatak ku ciid nu azaway.
azaway o saatekakay ko kilang no azaway. sipisanga' to kawil no tatak ko ciid no azaway.
